name: macos-finder
description: Manage files in Finder via AppleScript
author: Example

command.description: Action to perform: 'get' lists selected files, 'search' finds files by name, 'quickLook' previews a file

query.description: Search pattern for finding files. Supports wildcards (*). Required for searchFiles command

location.description: Directory path to search in. Absolute or relative to home. Default: '~' (home directory)

file_path.description: Absolute or relative path to file for preview. Required for quickLookFile command

result.description: File paths for get/search, preview status for quickLook, or error details if command failed
